content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs my computer, I previously encountered a display error while loading an image of Spain using a shell command. To fix this, I started the x11-common service with another shell command. Recently, I received a command to load an image using gpicview from a specific file path, but it returned an error saying gpicview was not found. In response, I executed a new shell command to start the x11-common service, export the display, and load the image using eog from a specific file path.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Setting up X socket directories... /tmp/.X11-unix /tmp/.ICE-unix.\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb'Unable to init server: Could not connect: Connection refused\\n\\n(eog:2743): Gtk-WARNING **: 22:10:02.729: cannot open display: :0\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo service x11-common start && export DISPLAY=:0 && xloadimage /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/d65a4e40-6b24-4230-bb69-9510cbda8351.jpg"}}}'}]
"""
